headline: A Look At Bio-Techne (TECH) Valuation After Analyst Downgrade And Softer Cash Flow Concerns
summary: Bio-Techne (TECH) is back in focus after a recent analyst downgrade that cited softer organic growth and a weaker free cash flow margin, raising fresh questions about how investors should think about the stock today. See our latest analysis for Bio-Techne. Despite the downgrade, Bio-Techne’s share price has held up reasonably well, with a 7 day share price return of 9.8% and a 90 day share price return of 10.1%. However, the 1 year total shareholder return of a 13.6% decline signals that...
